Translations.Text: wal-sabiquna l-awaluna mina l-muhajirina wal-ansari wa-alladhina ittabaʿuhum bi-ih'sanin radiya l-lahu ʿanhum waradu ʿanhu wa-aʿadda lahum jannatin tajri tahtaha l-anharu khalidina fiha abadan dhalika l-fawzu l-ʿazimu
wamimman hawlakum mina l-aʿrabi munafiquna wamin ahli l-madinati maradu ʿala l-nifaqi la taʿlamuhum nahnu naʿlamuhum sanuʿadhibuhum marratayni thumma yuradduna ila ʿadhabin ʿazimin
waakharuna iʿ'tarafu bidhunubihim khalatu ʿamalan salihan waakhara sayyi-an ʿasa l-lahu an yatuba ʿalayhim inna l-laha ghafurun rahimun
khudh min amwalihim sadaqatan tutahhiruhum watuzakkihim biha wasalli ʿalayhim inna salataka sakanun lahum wal-lahu samiʿun ʿalimun
alam yaʿlamu anna l-laha huwa yaqbalu l-tawbata ʿan ʿibadihi wayakhudhu l-sadaqati wa-anna l-laha huwa l-tawabu l-rahimu
waquli iʿ'malu fasayara l-lahu ʿamalakum warasuluhu wal-mu'minuna wasaturadduna ila ʿalimi l-ghaybi wal-shahadati fayunabbi-ukum bima kuntum taʿmaluna
waakharuna mur'jawna li-amri l-lahi imma yuʿadhibuhum wa-imma yatubu ʿalayhim wal-lahu ʿalimun hakimun
